Buttons

What is it?

Listen to user events, click, double click, toggle…

Specs

CSS Class: .x-btn

Ext.button.Button

Extends from Ext.Component

  • Button (.x-btn)

  • Inner button (.x-btn-inner)

    • glyph

    • menu

    • scale (‘small’,‘medium’,‘large’)

Example

Ext.create('Ext.button.Button', {
    handler: function() {
       alert("BAMM!");
    },
    renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
    text : 'Beatles',
    menu : {
       items : [{
          text : 'John'
       }, {
          text : 'Paul'
       }, {
          text : '...'
       }]
    }
});
